Text: Print doesn't look so great from the snapshots. thank you though for the effort you put here.
The bigger the size, the better the quality. ;)

Silence, i'm enjoying all your releases... Nice encodes, delivering a great video quality at files so small... I'm wondering which program do you use ( i'm with TRON 1080p in 13,5GB which i need to shrink to free a little space in my HD eheh )
Could you keep uploding those movies in 1080p? I watched Hugo from your release and its great, but it seems you're only uploding them in 720p now.
